page.title: 07HOLIDAYING AROUND ST.AGNES
page.content: MANY TOURISTS LIKE TO GO ON ST,AGNES BEACH TO SPEND THE DAY OR WALK ALONG THE CLIFF PATHS AROUND ST.AGNES. SOMETIMES THE TOURISTS LIKE TO GO TO A PICNIC AREA TO HAVE A PICNIC. TOURISTS CAN CAMP ON A LOCAL CAMP SITE OR STAY IN HOLIDAY ACCOMODATION SUCH AS LITTLE ORCHARD VILLAGE.THE CHALETS HERE ARE 40 YEARS OLD.THE CENTRE WAS BUILT IN THE 1950,S AND IT OPENED IN ABOUT 1953. LITTLE ORCHARD VILLAGE COVERS ALMOST THREE ACRES AND EMPLOYS ELEVEN STAFF TO LOOK AFTER ABOUT THREE HUNDRED HOLIDAY MAKERS.
